Title: Expands endangering the welfare of a child to include using a child for the purpose of begging, rag picking, collecting cigar stumps of refuse, or peddling; repealer
Summary: Expands endangering the welfare of a child to include using a child for the purpose of begging, rag picking, collecting cigar stumps or refuse, or peddling.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to endangering the welfare of a child; and to repeal paragraph (c) of subdivision 1 of section 35.07 of the arts and cultural affairs law relating to unlawful exhibitions
